Name: require_product_owner_presence
Description: Product Owner must be available during Sprint Planning

Name: limit_team_size
Description: Team size must not exceed 9 members (Scrum guideline)

Name: enforce_skill_match
Description: Workers assigned only if they possess required skill

Name: ensure_sprint_duration
Description: Sprint duration must be between 1 and 4 weeks

Name: respect_worker_availability
Description: Task assignment must not exceed individual availability

Name: complete_acceptance_criteria
Description: User Story status can only be 'done' if acceptance criteria are met

Name: mandatory_daily_scrum
Description: All team members must attend Daily Scrum

Name: retrospective_must_occur
Description: Each Sprint must have a Retrospective with improvement actions

Name: velocity_based_commitment
Description: Sprint commitment should not exceed 110% of average velocity

Name: blockers_must_be_resolved
Description: All high-severity blockers must be resolved before release

Name: documentation_per_feature
Description: Each feature must have at least one documentation entry
